--- In gladiator@y..., "Deathifier" <storey@t...> wrote:
> You could also make it such that an elf can only fire when within a 
certain
> distance from the forest edge.

That wouldn't be fair if an opponent elf was firing at you. :-(
 
> Of course you could be creative and make different density forests, 
mark
> that as an interesting point for a game modification :)

Hmm.  My 1st answer of the attack losing energy as it passes through 
the forest seems more better all the time. :-)

Good thing I am going to compile all the suggestions into a text file.
